NBA_Trivia_Questions_and_Answers.question: Which NBA player has won the most MVP awards?
Who was the first player to be drafted straight out of high school?
NBA_Trivia_Questions_and_Answers.answer: Moses Malone, in the 1974 ABA Draft.

NBA_Trivia_Questions_and_Answers.question: Which team holds the record for the most wins in a single regular season?
NBA_Trivia_Questions_and_Answers.answer: The Golden State Warriors, with 73 wins in the 2015-2016 season.

NBA_Trivia_Questions_and_Answers.question: Who is the all-time leading scorer in NBA history?

What is the name of the NBA trophy awarded to the champions?
Which NBA team has the most championships?
Who was the youngest player to score 30,000 points in his career?
Which player has the most career assists in NBA history?
Who is the only player to average a triple-double for an entire season, and how many times has he done it?
NBA_Trivia_Questions_and_Answers.answer: Oscar Robertson (once, 1961-1962) and Russell Westbrook (four times: 2016-2017, 2017-2018, 2018-2019, and 2020-2021).

NBA_History.question: Who was the first player to score 70 points in an NBA game?
NBA_History.answer: Elgin Baylor, scoring 71 points on November 15, 1960.

NBA_History.answer: Chuck Cooper, drafted by the Boston Celtics in 1950.

NBA_History.question: Which team was the first to go undefeated in an entire playoff run?
NBA_History.answer: The Golden State Warriors, with a 16-1 record in the 2017 playoffs.

NBA_History.question: Who was the first player in NBA history to be named MVP, Rookie of the Year and All-Star Game MVP in the same season?

NBA_History.answer: The New York Knickerbockers (Knicks) and the Toronto Huskies, on November 1, 1946.

NBA_History.question: Who was the first coach to win an NBA championship with two different teams?
NBA_History.answer: Alex Hannum, with the St. Louis Hawks in 1958 and the Philadelphia 76ers in 1967.

Which player holds the record for most consecutive games played in NBA history?
Who was the first foreign-born player to be selected first overall in the NBA Draft?
NBA_History.answer: Hakeem Olajuwon, from Nigeria, selected first overall in 1984.

NBA_History.question: Which team holds the record for the longest winning streak in NBA history?
NBA_History.answer: The Los Angeles Lakers, with 33 consecutive wins in the 1971-1972 season.
